channel.title: Nat on it-ninja
channel.description: Recent content in Nat on it-ninja

item.title: NAT and PAT
item.description: Basics Translates RFC1918 to routed public addreses 1:1 burns a lot public addresses. This is known as source nat (SNAT). Dynamic creates a pool on inside global address (DNAT). Port address translation overloads an interface so all users share a single inside global address (PAT). Address Types Inside Local address: RFC1918 address in my network. Inside Global address: Public IP address in my network. Outside Local address: RFC1918 address at a remote network.
